name: Sun Striker
description:
------------------------------------------------------------------

2039, Neo-Mexico City...

Sources have indicated that the AzTECH Corporation is dealing in the construction of illegal robotics systems...

As per regulation number 876-B3 of the Global Peace Regulatory Bureau, an investigative operation has commenced...

Agent 501 of the G.P.R.B Enforcement Team has been dispatched for this specific task...

---------------------------------------------------------------------

Features:

  • Four unique stages to traverse!
  • Face off against a menacing boss at the end of each stage!

---------------------------------------------------------------------

How to Play:

  • A - Move Left
  • D - Move Right
  • SPACE - Jump
  • SPACE 2x - Double Jump
  • LEFT CLICK - Sword Attack
  • RIGHT CLICK - Shoot Bolts

---------------------------------------------------------------------

Download Instructions:

  1. Download the game installer.
  2. Run the installation process.
  3. Enjoy!

---------------------------------------------------------------------

Note:

This game project may receive small updates in the future.

---------------------------------------------------------------------

Follow Us:

Twitter: @RoyalDenStudios

------------------------------------------------------------------
